attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every unemployed person receiving benefits must spend 20 hour per week job hunting and 20 hours working. the work could be social care, helping the elderly, teaching, in fact any area workers are needed. road workers, farmers, extra hands where needed. the unemployed person retains the work ethic and feels they are contributing. It would sort out the cant work wont work people. No pay they just qualify for there benefit. people could learn new skills this way. call it project fullemploy. most important stay in power we don't need a kindergarten leader.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
